query:
ALTER TABLE `ai_drift_metrics_history` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `accuracy_drop` decimal(10,6) AFTER `accuracy`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `feature_drift` decimal(10,6) AFTER `accuracy_drop`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `prediction_drift` decimal(10,6) AFTER `feature_drift`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `severity` varchar(20) AFTER `f1_score`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `timestamp` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `prediction_count`;
